result.email_subject: Seafood Buffet for Two People from Just $119!
result.name: All-You-Can-Eat Fresh Seafood Buffet
result.description: Seafood lovers rejoice with this all-you-can-eat seafood buffet experience from Baygarden Restaurant, located within the 4.5-star Novotel Sydney Brighton Beach. Feast on fresh seafood, antipasto, salad, hot food, desserts, cheese, and more!
result.inclusions: Voucher valid for a 90-minute seafood buffet sitting and a parking pass per couple. Thursday dinner and Sunday lunch/dinner voucher also includes one house drink per person.
result.whats_included:
- 90-minute seafood buffet sitting
- Parking pass per couple
- House drink per person (Thursday dinner and Sunday lunch/dinner option only)
- Children under four eat free (surcharge applies for ages 5-15)
- Available for two or four people
- Available hours: Thursday 6:00pm-9:00pm; Friday-Saturday 6:00pm-10:00pm; Sunday 12:30pm-2:30pm, 6:00pm-9:00pm

lowest_price_package.name: Seafood Buffet with Drinks (Thursday or Sunday)

packages.name: Seafood Buffet with Drinks (Thursday or Sunday)
Seafood Buffet with Drinks (Thursday or Sunday)

result.availability: Available hours: Thursday 6:00pm-9:00pm; Friday-Saturday 6:00pm-10:00pm; Sunday 12:30pm-2:30pm, 6:00pm-9:00pm. Not valid public holidays or special event days. Valid for the day selected at the time of purchase - please make your selection carefully.

redemption_locations.name: Brighton-Le-Sands
redemption_locations.address: Corner of The Grand Parade and Princess Street

result.how_to_redeem: Bookings essential on (02) 9556 5154 or via email h1656-fb11@accor.com quoting your voucher number. Book early to secure your desired date and time. Present printed or smartphone voucher on arrival.

fine_print.title: Inclusions
fine_print.body: Voucher valid for a 90-minute seafood buffet sitting and a parking pass per couple. Thursday dinner and Sunday lunch/dinner voucher also includes one house drink per person.

fine_print.title: Availability
fine_print.body: Available hours: Thursday 6:00pm-9:00pm; Friday-Saturday 6:00pm-10:00pm; Sunday 12:30pm-2:30pm, 6:00pm-9:00pm. Not valid public holidays or special event days. Valid for the day selected at the time of purchase - please make your selection carefully.

fine_print.title: Conditions of the Deal
fine_print.body: Customers will only be able to book for the day specified on the voucher option purchased. Children may eat at a cost of $42 per child aged 15 and under, payable directly to Baygarden. Children 4 years and under eat free. Please note, only the Thursday dinner and Sunday lunch/dinner option includes a house drink to the value of $8 per person. Items listed are sample only. Menu strictly subject to seasonal change. Voucher valid for dine-in only. Entire voucher must be used in one visit; unused portions of the voucher will be forfeited, and cannot be used at a later date. Any excess amount must be paid directly to Baygarden Restaurant. Maximum of 10 vouchers redeemable per booking. Voucher valid for two or four people. Vouchers for this offer are limited and subject to availability. Not valid with any other offer. Full terms and conditions are located on the terms and conditions page of our website.

fine_print.title: How to Redeem
fine_print.body: Bookings essential on (02) 9556 5154 or via email h1656-fb11@accor.com quoting your voucher number. Book early to secure your desired date and time. Present printed or smartphone voucher on arrival.

fine_print.title: Changes to Booking
fine_print.body: 48 hours’ notice is required to change a booking you have made.

fine_print.title: Cancellation
fine_print.body: All changes and cancellations are subject to our standard Refund Policy.

result.cancellations: All changes and cancellations are subject to our standard Refund Policy.
result.vendor_description: The next time you're in the area (or even if you have to travel), trust us, you'll want to pay a visit to Baygarden Restaurant, located within the 4.5-star Novotel Sydney Brighton Beach. With a beautiful modern Australian menu and plenty of fresh seafood (you just HAVE to try the buffet!), every taste is catered for.
result.section_content:
- Sydney rock oysters
- Blue swimmer crabs
- NZ mussels and prawns
- Chilli crabs and prawn crackers
- Ginger lime leaf coconut rice pilaf
- Fish with coconut lemongrass sauce
- Cajun-spiced lamb loin chops with grilled eggplant salsa
- Chocolate fountain
- Cheese board

__[See the full menu here](http://www.baygardenrestaurant.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/Seafood-Buffet-Sample-Menu.pdf)__
result.changes_to_booking: 48 hours’ notice is required to change a booking you have made.
